subject: Football
Playoff Games
Ankles (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre’s final pass in the N.F.C. championship — an interception late in the fourth quarter — might also have been the last pass of his N.F.L. career.
snippet: Brett Favre’s final pass in the N.F.C. championship — an interception late in the fourth quarter — might also have been the last pass of his N.F.L. career.
